Articles.Content:
So I've been here about a week and I have been having some problems. To start I don't have an upload Avatar button anywhere under Settings and the button for "don't use an avatar" can't be unchecked. Another Problem I've been running into is that I just don't have a edit Signature button under Settings ether. It could be that I'm still under 5 post, or something along those lines, but I really don't know. If a Admin, Mod, or a nice guy could come along and tell me it would be a great help.

Thanks!!!

Aye, you won't be able to modify your profile until you've more than 3 posts. It was previously five, but as far as I'm aware it is at present only three. [[EDIT: It appears to be back at 5 posts again.]]

It's a simple but effective spam prevention measure

Edited December 19, 2013 by vexx32
THAT'S why it did it when I joined the forums... xD never knew that

Thanks Vexx, I was really confused and none of the guys i knew, knew what was happening so I thought I had messed up my registion, but know I understand, I'm glad you knew what the problem was and how to "fix" it

Thanks!
Useful info! Was wondering why I had some missing features for a long time now.
tanks for the info, I thought I was going blind
